863390.name: Elemensional Rift
863390.description:
Elemensional Rift brings forth a new dimension of combat to the world of platform fighters.  In a battlefield of up to four players, manage your energy consumption while luring your opponents to exhaust their energy to create openings for your biggest attacks.  Only the strongest, craftiest, and most creative can reach the top and remain the last one standing on the battlefield.

Enter a world a family of gods continue to clash and outdo each other, leaving humanity pushed into the brink of extinction in the aftermath of the squabbles of gods.  Uncover the powers of the Hebinonaija Mask, give humanity a fighting chance (or destroy them by your own hands), and determine the fate of the universe by the might of your own powers.

Challenge yourself in a variety of both game modes and battle modes to give yourself the specific excitement you are craving.  Some of the options include

  • Arcade mode

  • Story mode

  • Survival mode

  • Boss Rush mode

  • Onslaught battles

  • Bounty battles

  • more to come
863390.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
